item.description:
The digital camera is an exceptionally powerful tool for personal creative expression. This class will introduce you to the digital camera and how to harness that power to make better images. We will cover camera controls, focus and exposure techniques and basic photography methods. Once you start to understand the operation of the camera you can begin to take creative control of your results!

Unfortunately the complex technology of digital cameras can become an obstacle and a source of frustration. In the INTRO to DIGITAL PHOTOGRAPHY workshop we will cover the camera controls and techniques that will get you past the technology barrier and into better photography!

The three hour class(11 am to 2 pm) is a combination of lecture and conversation. You will be provided a printed class guide to follow and make notes on and including a set of practice exercises to build on the skills covered in the workshop.  Please bring your digital camera and the camera owner’s manual to the class.

TOPICS and SKILLS covered in this workshop include the following:

  • Intro to camera controls 
  • Understanding light and exposure 
  • Lens selection and optics 
  • Basic photographer techniques 

This class is recommended to adults who are new to digital photography or those who need a good review to invigorate their photography.  The concepts and techniques covered will be useful for both owners of point & shoot cameras or Digital SLR’s.
item.how_to_find_us: For directions go to my website directions page - http://www.testoftimephoto.com/DIRECTIONS.html
item.why:
Do you have a new digital camera and you are not sure how to use it?
Do you want to make better digital photos?
Do you images match your creative intent or do they fall short of your expectations?
item.name: INTRO to DIGITAL PHOTOGRAPHY WORKSHOP
